summary: This chapter presents an extensive reference list and notes that support the theories and concepts discussed throughout the book. It contains sources from previous works by Brené Brown and various research studies that explore themes of vulnerability, shame, and resilience. Each section highlights the critical contributions of researchers in psychology, sociology, and other fields.
